body.name: Midea MLH25N7BWW Compact Front-Load Machine, 24" Energy & Space-Saving Washer, Steam Care and Cold Wash Stackable Laundry, for Family Daily use, 2.5 Cu.ft, White
features: Powerful Steam for Gentle Cleaning - The power of steam pre-treats your fabric by penetrating deep into fabric fibers to loosen stains but is still gentle on your clothing.
The motor you can rely on - Quieter and efficient operation with the Midea Brushless Inverter Motor. A 10-year warranty backs it.
Reduce color fading and shrinking without losing the cleaning power with the Cold Wash Cycle. The Cold Wash cycle also saves energy.
Super Clean - The internal heater brings water temp up to 152Fº to handle tough stains and pet dander.

Warning - To prevent the washer from moving around while running——1. Loosen all bolts with a spanner and then remove them. 2. Cover the holes with transport hole plugs. 3. Keep the transport bolts for future use.
body.description: Feeling unsafe going to Laundromat? Tired of sending and picking up clothes from public washer? Want to have your own laundry setup in your bathroom? Let this little machine do all the magic for you! It's small, space saving, and yet powerful to take care of your daily laundry needs. - Space saving, fits in your room/RV/dormetory nicely - High quality and durable motor, providing stable power - Stainless steel inner tub with multiple washing programs to choose from - See-through lid and LED display - Brand new washing machines come with a drain plug: don’t forget to remove it before you hook up the drain hose.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ENERGY STAR Certified by UL-CCIC COMPANY LIMITED in 2022 Certified by the U.S. Environmental. Protection Agency; helps to conserve energy and spend less on utility bill. Cold Wash The washing rhythm can be intelligently controlled and the clothes will be washed by three major water streams to achieve the same cleaning performance without heating. Washing in cold water can help slow fading of colors and shrinking in fabrics. Cold Wash cycle also saves energy. Washer Clean Cycle Your washer too needs periodical cleaning to keep your clothes clean everytime you wash them. High temperature and flush flow of Tub Clean Cycle will maintain your washer clean and odor free.

Quick Wash The 36 minutes' quick wash can be used for small loads to speed up washing tempo and reduce power consumption. Even quick wash can meet your daily needs. Health Care Through Sanitary Cycle, the internal heater brings water temp up to 152Fº to handle tough stain, pet dander, dust and greasy dirt, contributing to your super clean living environment. My Cycle You can customize a preset cycle by pushing and holding "My Cycle" button for 3 seconds; modifying the drying setting to your need and store it so you can use it the next time you need it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact Size, Big Performance
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Midea washer, and I'm thrilled to share my thoughts on this fantastic product. Its compact size has proven to be a perfect fit for my family of two, and it delivers impressive performance and convenience.The compact design of this washer is a standout feature. It's perfectly suited for households with limited space, and it fits seamlessly into my small laundry area. Despite its smaller size, it offers everything I need for efficient and effective laundry care.What truly impressed me is the washer's performance. It may be compact, but it handles laundry loads exceptionally well. It efficiently cleans my clothes, leaving them fresh and clean after each wash cycle. It handles different fabric types and soil levels with ease, making it a versatile choice for a variety of laundry needs, even for a family of two like mine.The control panel is user-friendly and intuitive, allowing me to select the right wash cycle and customize settings as needed. The display provides clear information on cycle progress, ensuring that I can keep track of my laundry without any hassle.Despite its size, this Midea washer operates quietly, which is a big bonus. I can run it without causing any disruptions, even during late evenings or early mornings when I want to get a head start on laundry.The build quality feels solid and durable, instilling confidence that it will serve me well for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The washing machine was delivered on time and carried into my home. The set up was very easy as expected, I do like the printing on the supply lines provided is red for hot and blue for cold, this is convenient. The washing machine runs quiet and efficient. I really have no complaints.Looking forward to receiving the dryer.
